CustomField.formula:
IF(AND( Downtime_Start_Month__c=1, Downtime_End_Month__c=1), Duration_s__c,
IF(AND( Downtime_Start_Month__c=1, Downtime_End_Month__c=2),
(DATETIMEVALUE(TEXT(YEAR(DATEVALUE(Downtime_Start_Date__c)))&"-01-31 23:00:00.000")-Downtime_Start_Date__c)*86400,
IF(AND( Downtime_Start_Month__c=12, Downtime_End_Month__c=1),
(Downtime_End_Date__c-DATETIMEVALUE(TEXT(YEAR(DATEVALUE(Downtime_Start_Date__c)))&"-12-31 23:00:00.000"))*86400,
0)))
CustomField.label: Downtime (s) - January
